C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, UseTab: Never, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, BreakBeforeBraces: Allman, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: true, IndentCaseLabels: true, ColumnLimit: 0, AccessModifierOffset: -4, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: true, AllowShortLoopsOnASingleLine: true, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: true}
